title: Ep 21: Tom Everett Scott
itunes:title: Ep 21: Tom Everett Scott
itunes:subtitle: Just two weeks ago I tweeted about watching “That Thing You Do” for the first time and developing my first celebrity crush on Tom Everett Scott and now here we are: Tom Everett Scott is on Gee Thanks.
description:
Just two weeks ago I tweeted about watching “That Thing You Do” for the first time and developing my first celebrity crush on Tom Everett Scott and now here we are: Tom Everett Scott is on Gee Thanks, and he brought products to share and I tried to not get too giggly during our Skype call (I failed). Let this be a lesson to you all! The celebrities are home and they are as bored as we are. Call them up!


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Tom Everett Scott and I discuss phone accessories for the car, alternatives to coffee cups, my inflatable hot tub that I’m sure really impressed him, and our mutual disappointment in In-N-Out’s fries.


The Oneders are getting back together today for a live Zoom reunion TODAY, April 17, at 4pmPDT/7pmEST! Watch here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5EXGqGTcyG8&feature=emb_title



Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Kenu Airframe+ | Vent Car Phone Mount Holder: https://amzn.to/2yWXNjY 
  • The KeepCup: https://amzn.to/3bchp21 
  • The SaluSpa Inflatable Hot Tub: https://amzn.to/3aebdFj 
  • “I’m Sorry” on TruTV (Seasons 1 and 2 avail on Netflix): https://www.netflix.com/title/80171611
  • Watch “That Thing You Do”: https://amzn.to/3aiOmIU 
  • The tweet that started it all: https://twitter.com/CarolineMoss/status/1247020947099373570


PS. If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Thanks for listening!

Site Makeover Alert! Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store! https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

The Spreadsheet is UNDER CONSTRUCTION and it will be back soon, better than ever!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


We have a phone number! Call it! You may be featured on an upcoming special listeners-only ep of the podcast: 424-245-0736.

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
